pages.title: Soulbound Resonator
pages.text: Located in the Necrotic Synthesis Wing, the Soulbound Resonator is an imposing device composed of interlocking rings and crystalline components. It is engineered to extract and bind souls, serving as the focal point for controlled necromantic research.

pages.title: Functions
pages.text: It transduces necrotic energy, enabling the conversion between life and death, and facilitates the transfer of memories between souls. Its connection to the Aetherflow Conduit ensures that these delicate processes remain stable and potent.
